Address.label: Address
Address.value: 700 SAINT-ANTOINE STREET EAST,SUITE 300, MONTREAL, Quebec, H2Y 1A6, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Lightspeed Commerce Inc provides an omni-channel commerce-enabling SaaS platform. Its software platform provides customers with the functionality it needs to engage with consumers, manage their operations, accepts payments, and grow their business. The company sells its platform through a direct sales force in the United States, Canada, Netherlands, Australia, and other countries. It derives a majority of its revenue from the United States.
